an8.86:5.1: ekaccā nayimassa → ekaccā imassa (?) | assu → idaṃ padaṃ katthaci | akicchalābhiniyo → nikāmalābhiniyo akicchalābhiniyo (?)
an8.86:5.2: Tumhākampi → tāsampi (?) | anuyuttānaṃ viharataṃ → anuyutte viharante disvā (?)
an8.86:5.3: na hi nūname → naha nūna me (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | assu → idaṃ padaṃ katthaci
an8.86:8.3: imaṃ → idānimaṃ (katthaci) | upaṭṭhahissati → paccessati (bj); saccessati (pts-vp-pli1ed); upaṭṭhahati (mr) | Taṃ tamhā → so taṃ tamhā (?)
an8.86:12.1: an8.86:12.1–an8.86:14.1 etthantare pāṭho 16A6:267 chakkanipāteyeva dissati, na ettha
